summary: A new standalone Follower based on Amberle elven princess of the MTV tv serie
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]                                              AMBERLE FOLLOWER

[size=3][center]Amberle is a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.

[size=3][Follower detail]
[/size]
Name : Amberle
Race : Breton
Level : 8 - No limit
Voice : Young Eager
Body : UNP
Textures: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)
Weight : 50
Default Armor : Sadistic Magician Mash-Up Outfit for UNP by AmeeraGirl and Halo
Default Weapon : Elven dagger.
Location : Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood
Combat Style : Thief combat
[size=2][size=3]She is Merriable and unkillable
[/size]
[size=5]BUG FIXED Problem for the eyes missing textures SOLVED IN 1.1 SORRY FOR THE MISTAKE GUYS![/size]

[/size][size=4][Special Thanks]

[b]Dracofish aka MelissaGT[/b]
[b]Maevan2[/b]
[b]Zonzai and Seren4XX[/b]
[b]AmeeraGirl and Halo[/b]
Kalilies
dimon99
